attributes.action: Explain Why Valid Petitions Are Being Removed Which Previously Appeared
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am aware that this will be rejected by e-petitions as it raises queries as to the administration of e-petitions itself.  However, 10 emails to "the team" over three months have been ignored.  My votes on certain petitions have been removed.  My earlier rejected petitions - previously available to view - have been removed, along with one which I was querying with e-petitions as to why the web-site was blocking any signatures to it.  From the website: "To ensure transparency, any petition that cannot be accepted will be listed, along with the reasons why. A list of rejected petitions is available on this website."

This is created on 12th April 2007 and at the time of "going to press" is entirely accurate. So, e-petitions, what's the story?  I am requesting action that you explain why you are removing valid petitions, and are so clearly NOT being transparent.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
